mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainSetting(trainCategory, roomNum, trainSeq, roomGrade, seatRow, seatColumn) VALUES(#{trainCategory}, #{roomNum}, #{trainNum}, #{roomGrade}, #{seatRow}, #{seatColumn})
mapper.select: SELECT trainSeq, trainCategory, COUNT(roomNum) roomNum, SUM(seatRow*seatColumn) trainSeatCount FROM trainSetting group by trainCategory;
